name: liquid-breakout-backend
description: The backend serving all requests that requires an external server for Liquid Breakout.

scripts.build_app_balancer: npm run build_app && cp -f dev_config/balancer.env app/dev_config/.env && npm run build_app_binary -- LBBackend_Balancer x64
scripts.build_app_worker: npm run build_app && cp -f dev_config/worker.env app/dev_config/.env && npm run build_app_binary -- LBBackend_Worker x64
scripts.build_app_balancer_arm64: npm run build_app && cp -f dev_config/balancer.env app/dev_config/.env && npm run build_app_binary -- LBBackend_Balancer arm64
scripts.build_app_worker_arm64: npm run build_app && cp -f dev_config/worker.env app/dev_config/.env && npm run build_app_binary -- LBBackend_Worker arm64

author: cutymeo
